strategies.name: Center-Edge
strategies.description: Optimized for detecting radial process variation and edge-of-wafer instability.

strategies.name: Grid Uniform
strategies.description: Standard baseline distribution for general process monitoring and uniformity control.

strategies.name: Edge Only
strategies.description: High-density focus on the wafer perimeter to isolate bevel and clamp-related defects.

strategies.name: Zone Ring N
strategies.description: Concentric ring distribution for systematic analysis of rotational symmetry variations.
